name: Old Whirled
description: Recreated old black Whirled best I could. Features the original logo and me/stuff/games/rooms/groups/shop buttons, along with darker colors.
additional_info:
7/8/2016 update: specified text colors for the upper right... 
-light grey: coins, level 
-light blue: name, help, privacy, logoff
Whirleds were overwriting these colors, but not the background color, causing black text on black background a lot.
